Sentencas: Oxidative coupling of methane (OCM) was simulated using plug flow reactor models.
Titulo: Comparative study of oxidative coupling of methane modeling in various types of reactor

Sentencas: Performances of several membrane reactors; i.e. porous membrane reactor (PMR), mixed ionic and electronic conducting membrane reactor (MIEMR) and solid oxide fuel cell reactor (SOFCR) were compared with those of a conventional fixed-bed reactor (FBR).
Titulo: Comparative study of oxidative coupling of methane modeling in various types of reactor

Sentencas: For SOFCR, La0.85Sr0.15MnO3/8 mol% Y2O3-ZrO2/La1.8Al0.2O3 (abbreviated as LSM/YSZ/LaAlO) were the components of cathode, electrolyte and anode, respectively.
Titulo: Comparative study of oxidative coupling of methane modeling in various types of reactor

Sentencas: The membranes for PMR and MIEMR were gamma-alumina and La0.40Sr0.60Ga0.40Fe0.60O3-delta, respectively.
Titulo: Comparative study of oxidative coupling of methane modeling in various types of reactor

Sentencas: The kinetic expressions of Li/MgO catalyst were employed in the FBR, PMR and MIEMR models.
Titulo: Comparative study of oxidative coupling of methane modeling in various types of reactor

Sentencas: All types of membrane reactors obviously improved C2 selectivity compared to FBR.
Titulo: Comparative study of oxidative coupling of methane modeling in various types of reactor

Sentencas: However, only SOFCR was inferior to FBR in term of C2 yield due to much lower methane conversion when operating at the same temperature.
Titulo: Comparative study of oxidative coupling of methane modeling in various types of reactor

Sentencas: PMR was superior to the other membrane reactors at low temperature (< 1150 K) while MIEMR was attractive at high temperature (> 1150 K).
Titulo: Comparative study of oxidative coupling of methane modeling in various types of reactor

Sentencas: However, PMR might not be suitable for use, especially, in the case with inerts or impurities in the oxygen feed.
Titulo: Comparative study of oxidative coupling of methane modeling in various types of reactor

Sentencas: Operation at high pressure was obviously beneficial only to MIEMR and SOFCR.
Titulo: Comparative study of oxidative coupling of methane modeling in various types of reactor

Sentencas: The drawback of PMR was methane loss through the non-selective porous membrane while that of SOFCR was the requirement of higher operating temperature of approximately 200 K compared to the others.
Titulo: Comparative study of oxidative coupling of methane modeling in various types of reactor

Sentencas: However, the electricity simultaneously generated as a by-product might make SOFCR still attractive.
Titulo: Comparative study of oxidative coupling of methane modeling in various types of reactor
